numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that more players of color play in professional sport leagues.
2. I wonder how this data compares to previous years.
3. I wonder if this is a consistent trend.
4. This situation has an impact on my community.
5. This situation gives more motivation to people in my community.
6. This motivation influences why they want to become professional players.
7. This motivation influences why they want to join a league.
8. The headline is: Diversity in professional sports.
